caption.p: The effect of Lactobacillus fermentum BGSR163 and BGSR227 live strains and cell culture supernatants on toxicity, assessed by LDH assay (A) and the effect of L. fermentum BGSR163 and BGSR227 cell culture supernatant on metabolic activity of Caco-2 cells (B). All values are presented as mean ± SD from three independent experiments. DMEM – Dulbecco’s Modified Eagle’s Medium.
